title: Selena Gomez on ‘The Voice’: Taylor Swift giving her advice on mentoring
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
  The time has at long last come! Selena Gomez, 23, is set to make her introduction on The Voice with the begin of the fight rounds on Oct. 12 and the “Bravo” vocalist isn’t squandering at whatever time getting into the depression of things.

Taylor had a considerable measure of fun when she did it and needs Selena to have the same experience.”
